snippet: The United States was eliminated from the World Cup by Belgium despite a memorable performance from goalkeeper Tim Howard.
abstract: United States is eliminated from World Cup by Belgium, but memorable performance from United States' goalkeeper Tim Howard inspires nation; soccer is gaining in popularity in America, and team's showing, especially Howard's performance, further captivates and propels sport's growing popularity.

byline.contributor: Ken Belson and Marc Tracy contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The United States was eliminated from the World Cup by Belgium despite a memorable performance from goalkeeper Tim Howard.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Belgium Eliminates Team U.S.A.
headline.main: Wild Ride by U.S. Comes to End, but Soccer Is the Winner
headline.print_headline: Wild Ride by U.S. Reaches End, but Soccer Comes Out a Winner

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
